about_the_game:
Station Haven 3 is a first-person horror game where you will be playing as the newest crew member aboard the station Haven 3.

As you wake up to the growing sound of an engine, you find yourself aboard a Pod that's about to arrive at Station Haven 3. With no recollection of how you got there in the first place, or even who you are, you unwillingly step onto the Station.

Where is everyone?

Uncover the mystery of the crew's vanishing aboard the station. Find their audio logs and uncover their story, along with their last moments before they disappeared. 

Maintain the ship's usability.

As you uncover the secrets of the Station, you must make sure that it maintains full usability. By using the Terminal aboard the Station, figure out what section of the ship requires your attention and fix the issue before it's too late.

Uncover the secrets of the Station and find out who you are.

Who sent you here? Why were you sent here? Who even are you? Slowly piece together the clues you will find aboard the station and put everything together to figure out what has happened.

Find a way to escape.

Will you be able to find a way to get back home? Is there even a way out?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Quad-Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These requirements are currently temporary and will be updated accordingly. Especially the Disk Space.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Quad-Core CPU
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6-8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These requirements are currently temporary and will be updated accordingly. Especially the Disk Space.

short_description: You are the lucky winner of a Space Research program aboard Station Haven 3! Join the station and the crew to learn and explore the dark side of Mars!
